data.text:
Today is a [Selection Race]. A full-scale event for Uma Musume 
that will heavily influence their future prospects.
data.processed:
󠁿Today is a [Selection Race]. A full-scale event for Uma Musume 
󠁿that will heavily influence their future prospects.

data.text:
Gathered on the course were several up-and-coming 
Uma Musume, all were the same in that they were fired 
up, aiming for their debut… However-
data.processed:
󠁿Gathered on the course were several up-and-coming 
󠁿Uma Musume, all were the same in that they were fired 
󠁿up, aiming for their debut… However-

data.text:
Wooow, there are alot of people here! 
It's almost like we're having a party~!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Wooow, there are alot of people here! 
󠁿It's almost like we're having a party~!!

data.text:
Since we have so many people here, 
after the race how about we all have a barbeque?!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Since we have so many people here, 
󠁿after the race how about we all have a barbeque?!

data.text: Hey! How about you?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Hey! How about you?

data.text: Eh?! M-me…? I'll have to decline…?
data.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
data.processed: 󠁿Eh?! M-me…? I'll have to decline…?

data.text:
Oh, is that so? Too bad, so sad, 
maybe next time then.
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, is that so? Too bad, so sad, 
󠁿maybe next time then.

data.text: -There was an Uma Musume who stood out, in a different way.
data.processed: 󠁿-There was an Uma Musume who stood out, in a different way.

data.text:
Taiki Shuttle, is it?… She's got talent but, 
that way she can't seem to stand still is concerning.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
󠁿Taiki Shuttle, is it?… She's got talent but, 
󠁿that way she can't seem to stand still is concerning.

data.text:
It seems that in mock races, 
she's had a lot of failed starts. How will she do today…?
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
󠁿It seems that in mock races, 
󠁿she's had a lot of failed starts. How will she do today…?

data.text:
And so the race began, 
the center of attention, Taiki Shuttle was-
data.processed:
󠁿And so the race began, 
󠁿the center of attention, Taiki Shuttle was-

data.text: Yahoooooooo!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Yahoooooooo!!

data.text:
Here comes Taiki Shuttle!! 
She's so fast, what fearsome speed!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Here comes Taiki Shuttle!! 
󠁿She's so fast, what fearsome speed!!

data.text:
That dash strength she showed out of the gate 
was definitely eye-catching. But-
data.processed:
󠁿That dash strength she showed out of the gate 
󠁿was definitely eye-catching. But-

data.text: Haa haa haa… Oh?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Haa haa haa… Oh?

data.text:
What's this?! Taiki Shuttle is starting to slow down!! 
She keeps getting passed by the others~!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿What's this?! Taiki Shuttle is starting to slow down!! 
󠁿She keeps getting passed by the others~!!

data.text: Eeh?! Wait, where's she looking now?!
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed: 󠁿Eeh?! Wait, where's she looking now?!

data.text: Hmmm, it definitely seems like her concentration is a problem…
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed: 󠁿Hmmm, it definitely seems like her concentration is a problem…

data.text:
In the end, Taiki Shuttle only got 
moderate results after the race.
data.processed:
󠁿In the end, Taiki Shuttle only got 
󠁿moderate results after the race.

data.text:
After the mock race was over, 
while I was walking down the road…
data.processed:
󠁿After the mock race was over, 
󠁿while I was walking down the road…

data.text: Uuu… my head is spinning…
data.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl

choices.text: (Wasn't she in the race with Taiki…?)

data.processed: 󠁿Uuu… my head is spinning…

data.text: Kyaa…!
data.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
data.processed: 󠁿Kyaa…!

data.text:
It looked like she was in bad shape, she stumbled 
and looked like she was about to collapse. In a 
panic, I was about to run up to her when-
data.processed:
󠁿It looked like she was in bad shape, she stumbled 
󠁿and looked like she was about to collapse. In a 
󠁿panic, I was about to run up to her when-

data.text: -Daaaaaaaash!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿-Daaaaaaaash!!

data.text: In that instant, someone came dashing past me…!
data.processed: 󠁿In that instant, someone came dashing past me…!

data.text: -And Caaaaaaatch!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿-And Caaaaaaatch!!

data.text: Eh…?
data.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
data.processed: 󠁿Eh…?

data.text:
Like a gust of win, with startling speed Taiki Shuttle ran up 
beside her, and splendidly caught her in her arms…!
data.processed:
󠁿Like a gust of win, with startling speed Taiki Shuttle ran up 
󠁿beside her, and splendidly caught her in her arms…!

data.text: Good! Looks like I made it in time!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Good! Looks like I made it in time!

data.text: Ehh, eh, eh? Taiki Shuttle-san…?
data.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
data.processed: 󠁿Ehh, eh, eh? Taiki Shuttle-san…?

data.text:
You didn't look too good during the race either. 
Pushing yourself too hard is a no no! Don't do it!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿You didn't look too good during the race either. 
󠁿Pushing yourself too hard is a no no! Don't do it!

data.text: Y-you noticed…?
data.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
data.processed: 󠁿Y-you noticed…?

data.text: Yes, of course!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Yes, of course!

data.text:
Alright, let's get you to the infirmary! 
Make sure you hold on tight!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Alright, let's get you to the infirmary! 
󠁿Make sure you hold on tight!

data.text: Huh…?
data.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
data.processed: 󠁿Huh…?

data.text:
Okay!…it's an emergency! 
Coming throuuuuuuuugh!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Okay!…it's an emergency! 
󠁿Coming throuuuuuuuugh!

data.text: Hyaaaaaaaaa-?!
data.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
data.processed: 󠁿Hyaaaaaaaaa-?!

data.text:
Once again, she took off with amazing speed! With speed like that 
it's hard to believe she's carrying another Uma Musume…!
data.processed:
󠁿Once again, she took off with amazing speed! With speed like that 
󠁿it's hard to believe she's carrying another Uma Musume…!

data.text: I was really curious, so without thinking I followed after them-
data.processed: 󠁿I was really curious, so without thinking I followed after them-

data.text:
It's good that it wasn't anything to worry about! 
Make sure to take care~!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿It's good that it wasn't anything to worry about! 
󠁿Make sure to take care~!

data.text: Yeah! Thank you Taiki-san, see you later…!
data.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah! Thank you Taiki-san, see you later…!

data.text: See you~!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿See you~!!

data.text:
Fufuu, getting to see her happy smile was a good thing! 
As I thought, it's best when everyone is happy!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Fufuu, getting to see her happy smile was a good thing! 
󠁿As I thought, it's best when everyone is happy!

data.text:
-Oh?! 
You, since when have you…?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

choices.text: I was just curious about you
I was just curious about you

data.processed:
󠁿-Oh?! 
󠁿You, since when have you…?

data.text:
About me…? 
Oh, that badge on your collar…!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿About me…? 
󠁿Oh, that badge on your collar…!

data.text:
Are you perhaps… scouting!? 
Scouting me?!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Are you perhaps… scouting!? 
󠁿Scouting me?!

data.text:
Yahoooooooo!! Okay okay, 
of course it's okay!! I'm so happy~~~~~!!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Yahoooooooo!! Okay okay, 
󠁿of course it's okay!! I'm so happy~~~~~!!!

data.text:
I need to go write my family a letter! 
My friends too!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿I need to go write my family a letter! 
󠁿My friends too!!

data.text:
That's right, we should throw a party too!! 
Of course, Trainer-san should come too!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿That's right, we should throw a party too!! 
󠁿Of course, Trainer-san should come too!!

data.text: The barbeque I make is a masterpiece, you know~!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿The barbeque I make is a masterpiece, you know~!

data.text:
We can work out the details tomorrow! Besides, 
from now on we're always going to be together during training!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿We can work out the details tomorrow! Besides, 
󠁿from now on we're always going to be together during training!

data.text:
Well then Trainer-san, see you tomorrow!! 
I look forward to working with you!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Well then Trainer-san, see you tomorrow!! 
󠁿I look forward to working with you!!

data.text:
And like that, Taiki Shuttle 
took off like a storm…
data.processed:
󠁿And like that, Taiki Shuttle 
󠁿took off like a storm…
